Changelog

All changelog you can observe on the github.

Roadmap

If you want to share an idea of improvement, please create issue with tag feature.

v. 1.0.3

  • Add easier jquery support with native javascript plugins in maxmertkit
  • Add dropdown -footer
  • Bugfixes

v. 1.0.2

  • No jquery in maxmertkit
  • Selenium tests support
  • Add circle spinner
  • Bugfixes

v. 1.0.1

  • Add howto videos
  • Add CDN
  • Bugfixes
